author: Tina Ford
comment: Enjoying my scales. App seems limited in what it can do - won't connect with Samsung Health for example but the info it produces is useful and interesting

author: Alain Riveros Rivera
comment: I spent 1 hour trying to connect a blood pressure monitor. It seems imposible. What a waste of time and money!

author: Denise Nolson
comment: I'm actually delighted with my purchase of the arm BP monitor, I assume earlier issues with setting up have been dealt with because it was incredibly simple to do and took a couple of minutes.  My reasons for four stars not five are both app related, it is easy to use but finding out how to export to email for instance is not intuitive, and I'm fairly tech savvy. But good old Google soon provided the solution and once exported it's easy to copy and paste the numbers into a spreadsheet, work out overall averages etc for my GP.   My other small gripe is that I can't add a short note to readings - for example today my BP has changed and it would have been useful to have that recorded in the reading.  Otherwise really pleased and would definitely recommend, I'm now saving up for the scales :)

author: Dym Note
comment: Bought the bloodpressuremeter because it should connect over wifi (instead of just bluetooth). But this is not working at all, not even with the app opened as mentioned on their website. Too bad.

author: Lynne Whitehorn
comment: Just doesn't seem to work. Won't pair with BP monitor. Error messages are nonsensical. Asks for permissions that are completely out of line. Device behavior is erratic. Support website has dead links to support docs. This is one of the worst apps I've ever tried to use.

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback, please send the question to the support@koogeek.com via screenshot or video. We will optimize the update as soon as possible.Glad to serve you.

author: Russ MIlham
comment: Utterly horrific setup experience. Installed and created an account expressly to use a new connected blood pressure cuff. The app is filled with typographical errors. The types of permissions necessary to enable the app are intrusive and nonsensical. The device setup workflow doesn't remotely match the written instructions. I still haven't figured it out and I've been designing software interfaces for two decades. It just looks like another app that scrapes personal data, for aggregation and resale, returns no value to me and drains my battery.

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback, it seems that you are professional for the application, please send your questions and suggestions to support@koogeek.com , we will be repaired and improved, very pleased to serve you.

author: Daniel Ribeiro
comment: I have the SG1 Smart Scale and it works very well with the scale. The only problem is the first set up. It took too many attempts to pair with the scale. If it was easier, for me it would be a 5 stars app.

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your support!~For your suggestion, we will update the fix as soon as possible.Glad to serve you.

author: Keith Finger
comment: I use exclusively for blood pressure.   If I take my BP without the app on the information is synchronized and puts the current date and time for all of the readings.  The wrist BP cuff does not seem to capture the readings correctly.  It is very low.  My wife is a RN and takes my BP the "old fashioned way " to compare.   Sometimes significant differences.

author: Andy Afef
comment: I advice you of reviewing your code again. This app won't let the cpu to sleep and it drained 50% of my galaxy s7e battery in 2 hours even though I wasn't using it. I was investigating the sudden extreme usage of the battery and it showed that this app kept the cpu working and kept using GPS without a stop even when the application is not working!

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: As part of the Android phone system version of the Bluetooth connection caused by some of the problems, all the Android phone version 6.0 and above, you must open the GPS connection Bluetooth, or can not connect. Thank you for your feedback and glad to serve you.

author: April Agostinello
comment: Very informative, works smoothly and synced within seconds!  Since my original review, I loved it so much that I now own the blood pressure monitor, scale and thermometer!  Each of these devices are amazingly accurate and sync with this app with no effort at all, and has proved it's helpfulness to many of my family's doctor's!  I can not stress enough how excellent these products are, and they will blow your mind over the competitors out there!  I stand by my Koogeek devices 100% and will not buy any other because my family deserves the best, most reliable health care devices to keep their doctor's informed and aware of any trends or sudden changes each appointment, or immediately after being recorded because I have it all at my fingertips 24/7  in easily understood graphs and charts  allowing me to see the big picture for each and everyone in my house!  I can't brag enough about the features and technology the app and devices give you at such a reasonable, affordable price!  Also has motivated my to loose weight and be more active because I can see how my chart fluctuates when I give in to the goodies and slack off!  Haha!  It's so much worse when you see those changes in charts and graphs and it makes me want to beat my last score!  Haha

author: Marko Mandač
comment: I have scale. From time to time connection with scale with phones does not work. For my girlfriend does not work at all. Weight of my girlfriend shows on my account. She is not able to connect with her phone again any more, we dont know why. She can not get new password also after she tries "forgotten password button". I order also blood pressure machine and temperature machine and now I regret it. If this is functioning this bad, who nows what will hapend with new devices. Your application is too bad. As you did not tested for one day to see issues and went into sales. Unprofessional!!!! And the products are not cheap that you can allow this failures.

author: Marinos Nicolaou
comment: Used to work fine. Now the KS-BP2 Blood Pressure monitor won't pair with my device. Utterly frustrating!

author: Jerod Swinehart
comment: App is a complete battery hog at 0.91% even when not in use.  The app also requires a lot of unnecessary permissions. If you turn the permissions off the app annoys you with a message. Why would this app need the microphone?

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Sorry, we will optimize our application in order to enhance the user experience, thank you for your feedback.

author: Angelo Polimeno
comment: App is graphically appealing but functionally a bit mediocre. It would be good to have a function to extract the bp data points, maybe in a chart, to show to my doctor

author: Jason Hurst
comment: I'm a little concerned about the permissions needed to use this app. The app works fine and wasn't too problematic to setup for my SG1 scale, but it keeps asking for permission related to making calls and access to media although I certainly won't be using features related to that.

author: Ron Koerner
comment: The app no longer uploads weight data after several months of usage I uninstalled and reinstall the app and nothing fixed it I contacted the manufacturer explained that there is an error with the wifi configuration but have not heard back from them

author: George Vander Dussen
comment: It works fine with my Samsung Galaxy S5, but I wish it would sync data with Samsung Health.  Virtually every other bluetooth device syncs with Samsung Health, but this one doesn't.

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: I will communicate with the technical department colleagues this issue, and update as soon as possible, thank you for your feedback.

author: James Lowe
comment: Been using app with wrist BP monitor for a few weeks. Connects with app upon launch and records reliably. Minimal drain on phone battery.
App was not functional for me at all. Unable to get it connected to my WiFi network or paired with bluetooth on my Moto e4 phone. Uninstalled app and am done with it.

author: Christine Hunt
comment: I like it alot, only using thermometer at the moment, but would be 5 stars if we could add notes like medicine given alongside temperatures (really useful for parents!)

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. In view of your suggestion, we will update as soon as possible.Glad to serve you!~

author: victor hosey
comment: The app or the website will let me create an account or sync at all, there's some unknown error. I'm returning it.

author: Jawad Sayani
comment: Can't even login, just says "Server error, please wait a moment"  I've waited a day and tried again - still same error...poor.

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Sorry, the login service is faulty, it is very sorry for your inconvenience, and now it is back to normal, you can try to use, thank you for your feedback!Glad to serve you!~

author: Alexis George
comment: Works well with both devices (blood pressure cuff  & thermometer) without any fussing in the middle. It reads the info without wires and keeps it. Great for tracking for my cheap if condition.

author: Rik G
comment: Would be good if it connected with Samsungs S-Health and other bluetooth devices.

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your support, if you have good suggestions can be fed back to support@koogeek.com , we will improve, I am pleased to serve you.

author: Otha Simmons
comment: Great app to record weight, BP, Temp etc. Wish it linked with samsung health. Also if it had a spot for blood sugar reading and or linked with other apps that do.

author: Taner Topal
comment: Google login is fixed now but it stopped connecting to my S1 scale

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Please phone models, system version to inform us, I will communicate with the technical department colleagues this issue, and repair as soon as possible, thank you for your feedback.

author: Robert Bergsman
comment: "Temp-reading-complete" beep is to low for older people to hear

author: Greg Edmand
comment: Worked well for half a day. Now, for some reason I can't find, it won't take the test results. Yet Bluetooth settings says it sees the BP-1

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: If the technical problems, please phone models, system version to inform us, I will communicate with the technical department colleagues this issue, and repair as soon as possible, thank you for your feedback.

comment: Knowing accurately what my BP is doing is a great help in trying to combat hypertension, and being able to track and share easily with my Doctor is brilliant

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your support!~Glad to serve you!~

author: Jessy Grondin
comment: Cannot pair with pixel 2 it ask for wifi information but won't connect to the tplink sent an email to support never had any answer

author: Dave Morrison
comment: Installed and synced easily . All readings of BP are 10 to 20 mm high for systolic. 5 to 10 for diastolic. If it can't be fixed its going back.

author: Ivan Brooking
comment: Was a bit tricky to pair the BP monitor, but once I got it working it's great.

author: Daniel Tardif
comment: Have the Koogeek  blood pressure device works very well connected to my Galaxy s7 very easily nice product.

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your support~Glad to serve you!~

author: Rahmoune s
comment: Doesn't work with my phone ??😑😞

author: MARGARET BROTZE
comment: Need to address low blood pressure as well as high.

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. In view of your suggestion, we will fix it and update as soon as possible.Glad to serve you!~

author: Lucian Surdu
comment: Keeps on disconnecting. Very frustrating.

author: David Juarez
comment: I just bought the smart health scale s1 and it won't connect to app via WiFi or Bluetooth

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: As part of the Android phone system version of the Bluetooth connection caused by some of the problems, all the Android phone version 6.0 and above, must open the GPS connection Bluetooth.  Download koogeek app, open the Bluetooth and GPS switch,  S1 boot will automatically connect.Thanks for your feedback .

author: Robert Stead
comment: Yep works pretty well, the meters fairly accurate as long as it's put on your arm correctly

author: Joyce Caristi
comment: So far so good, I like being able to record & show Dr. The results

reply.author: TOMTOP Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your support, for your suggestions we will optimize the update as soon as possible, I am pleased to serve you.

author: Greg Artz
comment: Drains battery so fast. Blood pressure monitor will connect but not the scale
